titles.title: A resolution authorizing the taking of a photograph in the Chamber of the United States Seante.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S13589

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 9/28/1994--Introduced. Suspends specified provisions of Rule IV of the Rules for the Regulation of the Senate Wing of the U.S. Capitol (prohibiting the taking of pictures in the Senate Chamber) to permit an official photograph to be taken of the Senate in actual session.
